error._primary: This address book could not be opened.
Failed to communicate with LDAP server.
This address book server does not have any suggested search bases.
This server does not support LDAPv3 schema information.
Could not get schema information for LDAP server.
LDAP server did not respond with valid schema information.
Could not remove address book.
Are you sure you want to delete address book “{0}”?
error._secondary: This address book will be removed permanently.

error._primary: Delete remote address book “{0}”?
error._secondary: This will permanently remove the address book “{0}” from the server. Are you sure you want to proceed?

error._primary: Category editor not available.
Unable to open address book “{0}”
Unable to perform search.
Failed to refresh address book “{0}”
Would you like to save your changes?
error._secondary: You have made modifications to this contact. Do you want to save these changes?

error._primary: Cannot move contact.
error._secondary: You are attempting to move a contact from one address book to another but it cannot be removed from the source. Do you want to save a copy instead?

error._primary: The image you have selected is large. Do you want to resize and store it?
error._secondary: An expected image size is up to 1024 x 1024 pixels.

error._primary: Unable to save {0}.
Address “{0}” already exists.
error._secondary: A contact already exists with this address. Would you like to add a new card with the same address anyway?

error._primary: Some addresses already exist in this contact list.
error._secondary: You are trying to add addresses that are part of this list already. Would you like to add them anyway?

error._primary: List “{0}” is already in this contact list.
error._secondary: A contact list named “{0}” is already in this contact list. Would you like to add it anyway?

error._primary: Failed to delete contact
error._secondary: You do not have permission to delete contacts in this address book.

error._primary: Cannot add new contact
error._secondary: “{0}” is a read-only address book and cannot be modified. Please select a different address book from the sidebar in the Contacts view.

error._primary: Cannot save a contact, address book is still opening
error._secondary: Cannot save a contact to the address book “{0}”, because it is still opening. Either wait till it’s opened, or select a different address book.

error._primary: Something has gone wrong when displaying the contact
error._secondary: A WebKitWebProcess crashed when displaying the contact. You can try again by moving to another contact and back. If the issue persists, please file a bug report in GNOME GitLab.

error._primary: Failed to refresh list of account address books
Do you want to unset contact image?
Contact already exists in the address book.
error._secondary: Contact “{0}” already exists in the address book “{1}”. Do you want to add a copy of it instead?
